message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,750?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value beyond the price.  How about we meet halfway between our offers at $11,125?

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $10,750, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
